description: Spamton G. Spamton is a diminutive, unhinged salesman from the game UNDERTALE.  He is characterized by his erratic behavior, nonsensical speech patterns filled with bracketed [[text]], and desperate attempts to scam others, particularly the player, for money (Kromer). Despite his apparent mental instability, he possesses a certain charisma and drive, fueled by a desire for freedom and the title of "Big Shot."
